text: GMS Racing was an American professional stock car racing team that competed in the NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series. GMS Racing used to compete in the NASCAR Xfinity Series from 2016 to 2019 and in the ARCA Menards Series from 2011 to 2015 and again from 2019 to 2022. On August 23, 2023, the team announced that it would end after the 2023 racing season. On April 15, 2025, it was reported that the team was rumored to return to full-time Truck Series racing with Dodge/RAM as a manufacturer. ==References== Category:Auto racing
title: GMS Racing
